org.gbif.registry.grizzly

Class RegistryServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.registry.grizzly.RegistryServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class RegistryServer
extends Object
implements org.junit.rules.TestRule
    An embedded web server using Grizzly that run the registry ws application. To allow WS tests to flush SOLR between runs, this allows the registration of the SOLR server.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_PORT
      The default port to use, should no system property be supplied.

      static String PORT_PROPERTY
      The system property one can set to override the port.

    • Method Detail

      • getPort

        public static int getPort()
        Gets the port that grizzly will run on. This will either be DEFAULT_PORT or the value supplied as a system property named PORT_PROPERTY.
